Quarter: The fiscal quarter for which the compliance audit costs are reported, e.g., Q3 2024.
Compliance_Certification: The specific compliance certification or regulation associated with the audit costs, e.g., PIPEDA, ISO 27001.
Audit_Cost: The total cost incurred for the compliance audit in the specified quarter.
Cost_Change_Percentage: The percentage change in audit costs compared to the previous quarter.
Notes: Additional notes or comments about the compliance audit or cost changes, e.g., reasons for cost increase.
Compliance costs are unrelated to IT service desk workload and response times.
Slight cost reduction from efficient auditing process.
Slight increase from additional documentation efforts.
Increase due to new data processing agreements.
Stable costs compared to the previous quarter.
